detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract HVUToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HVUToken.sol#102-223) has payable functions:
	 - HVUToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HVUToken.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
